title: MAVERICK 105 The Long Hunt [retr?tv]
description:
MAVERICK 105 The Long Hunt    20 Oct 1957

Bret owes his life to Lefty Dolan, the likeable bank robber, but when Lefty is shot and dying he confesses to a crime for which an innocence man is serving a life sentence. Bret, feeling that he&#039;s being driven by Lefty&#039;s ghost, spends a year trying to prove Jedd Ferris&#039; innocence. This is a marvellously well-written story by De Vallon Scott.

Stars James Garner as Bret Maverick 
Guest Stars: Joan Vohs (Martha Ferris), Richard Webb (Ben Maxwell), James Anderson (Whitey), Richard Crane (Jedd Ferris), Tommy Farrell (Lefty Dolan), Richard Reeves (Rex), Harry Harvey Sr. (Stage Coach Driver), Stanley Andrews (Sheriff)
Written by De Vallon Scott
First aired: 20 October 1957

MPEG1/320x240/50min

*REPOST* of the torrent originally posted last year on demonoid.
Multi-tracker with the inferno tracker alive and bustling. :)
